PROFESSIONAL SKILLS 
 Coding knowledge of Python 
 Coding in C, HTML and SQL 
 Awareness of software development methodologies   
PROJECTS 
 
1. Project Title: Secure Login System Web Page: 
 
Description:  Designed and developed a secure login system web page utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AngularJS. Implemented 
robust validation and authentication mechanisms to ensure user data security and prevent unauthorized access. Successfully presented the 
project, demonstrating my proficiency in web development technologies and ability to deliver a functional and secure login system.   
 
KEY CONTRIBUTIONS 
 
 Significant contributions in the front end and database management in the college event management project. 
 Successfully completed autonomous obstacle avoidance & GPS tracking system: a microcontroller-based project.  
INTERPERSONAL SKILLS 
 Currently serving as secretary of the college media team, overseeing content creation and strategic direction. 
 Awarded 2nd place in Photography Event at Insignia 2024, SDM College of Engineering & Technology, Dharwad. 
 Contributed to the Installation Event at VTU Youth Fest, held at SJCIT College, Chikkaballapur.  
 Skilled in multimedia editing, proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro, Lightroom, and After Effects, with expertise in video and photo 
editing, and visual effects. 
DECLARATION 
I hereby declare that the information provided above is true to the best of my knowledge.
